sentences.en: The wall through Berlin was finally ruptured, prefiguring the reunification of Germany.
sentences.cn: 柏林墙终于倒塌了，预示着德国的重新统一。

sentences.en: The desire for peaceful reunification of the mother and is taking hold in the hearts of the entire Chinese nation.
sentences.cn: 祖国和平统一的愿望，正在全中华民族的心中生根。

sentences.en: Since reunification in 1990, Germany has pushed back.
sentences.cn: 自1990年两德统一以来，德国人一直在推陈出新。
